BizHawk

for emulating console games. can read and modify the game state (ie, RAM) via Lua scripting
(external link)

other plunderludics

  • Sonic but every time you pick a ring it changes games

techniques

  • simulate key/controller input (e.g. trigger a jump)
  • set parameters or trigger events based on game state values (e.g. Mario X position)
  • modify game state values (e.g. num coins)
  • save state
  • load state

experiments

  • linked jumps
  • mario angst
  • mario feedback
  • flicker mario
  • mario ghost
  • mario in lylat system
  • tapestry
  • violence medium
